attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you fed up with always seeing 'fund raising' for 'other' countries and not enough done for our own?
Are you fed up with seeing more and more immigrants turning up in our country?
Are you fed up with being told you can't be who you are or say what you want because you've 'offended' somebody?
Do you want England to go back to the England we once had and loved, where children were allowed to play conkers, have a sports day etc & had respect for their elders?
Do you want 'other' religions to respect ours like we do when we go to their country?
Then help us & sign this petition to get the Government to give us back the country we were once proud of.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
